description.value: This sleek briefcase can securely hold up to 4 objects of light or negligible bulk. When you purchase a dromada clutch (or have access to one that is unsealed) you can set a command word that magically seals and unseals the briefcase. While sealed, a dromada clutch protects its contents from being viewed—even by @Compendium[sfrpg.equipment.aEKuCtuNjFLWtlAi]{x-ray scanners} and creatures with @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.rX5rK6UWAIOeeipl.JournalEntryPage.p0o9tmWtKZ0qy8DI#sense-through]{Sense Through}. In addition, hybrid and magic items within a sealed dromada clutch cannot be detected by divination effects, such as @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.kxx5x0JAgFuEQJAm]{Detect Magic} and @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.J6TKSw3AuZfwNW0A]{Arcane Sight}. A sealed dromada clutch acts as a container with a permanent @Compendium[sfrpg.spells.zjOo7OQKpRT5roSX]{Security Seal} spell and a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.76u4HnGcAlySicb4]{good lock}.
